members.signatureBeforeChange: int dragEnd(int widget, int context, int data)
members.signatureAfterChange: int dragEnd(int widget, int context, int data)
diff: -int dragEnd(int widget, int context, int data){
+int dragEnd(int widget, int context, int data){
+	 * Bug in GTK.  If a drag is initiated using gtk_drag_begin and the
+	 * mouse is released immediately, the mouse and keyboard remain
+	 * grabbed.  The fix is to release the grab on the mouse and keyboard
+	 * NOTE: We believe that it is never an error to ungrab when
+	OS.XtInsertEventHandler (handle, OS.FocusChangeMask, false, windowProc, SWT.FocusIn, OS.XtListTail);
